channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- SPIET800
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- SPIET800

item.title: CVE-2021-22288|2024-09-17T04:04:28.914Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2021-22286|2024-09-17T01:00:59.359Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.
